subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry, the son of former N.B.A. guard Dell Curry, scored 30, but it wasn’t enough for Davidson to overcome the Terrapins, who advanced to the second round.
snippet: Stephen Curry, the son of former N.B.A. guard Dell Curry, scored 30, but it wasn’t enough for Davidson to overcome the Terrapins, who advanced to the second round.
